#summary How to install overplayed on Windows.

= System Requirements =

*Windows 7* or *8*, *32-bit* or *64-bit* has been tested, but should work on any version of Windows that PPJoy Supports

*PPJoy installed* with *one virtual joystick created*.

= PPJoy installation =
PPJoy is a virtual joystick interface that overplayed uses to send input commands to your game or application.
